alert.note: Alert for Inland Camden; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 2:35PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of Nassau, northeastern Bradford, Baker, northeastern Union, northwestern Clay, northeastern Columbia, Duval, southern Camden and southeastern Charlton Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 235 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower near Cisco Gardens, or near Jacksonville International Arpt, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Orange Park, Hilliard, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Unf, Arlington, Middleburg, Taylor and Atlantic Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
